gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.render

Interface I3DTextRenderable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRenderable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CelestialBody, Constellation, Gaia, Loc, MilkyWay, ModelBody, Particle, Planet, Star

    public interface I3DTextRenderable
extends IRenderable
    Interface to be implemented by all entities that can render a text in 3d space.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
